entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump That is why the American people elected you President ~ you get stuff done. Do you know if there are US grants for woman starting businesses during the coronavirus pandemic? I would appreciate a private message if someone in your office knows. It will be female owned. Ty.
